configs.name: auth-ind-nbr
configs.description: Number of authorized individuals per entity

configs.name: first-reminder
configs.description: Duration between an initial disclosure request and the 1st automated reminder

configs.name: second-reminder
configs.description: Duration between an initial disclosure request and the second automated reminder

configs.name: delete-exhibit-forms-after
configs.description: Duration exhibit forms, once submitted, can survive in the ETT system before failure to send disclosure request(s) will result their deletion

configs.name: delete-drafts-after
configs.description: Duration that partially complete exhibit forms can survive in the ETT system before failure to submit them will result in their deletion

configs.name: consent-expiration
configs.description: Duration an individuals consent is valid for before it automatically expires
